channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）的一位高级助手敦促央行注意其决策的政治影响，因为最近的经济改革引起了公众的反弹
item.description: A senior aide to Nigerian President Bola Tinubu urged the central bank to pay attention to the political impact of its decisions, amid a public backlash over the fallout from recent economic reforms trib.al/bc6F9gN

item.title: 汉莎航空对意大利航空公司 ITA 的 3.25 亿欧元投资受到欧盟兼并监督机构的威胁
item.description: Lufthansa’s €325 million investment in Italian carrier ITA is under threat from EU merger watchdogs trib.al/pf2ge0H

item.title: RT by @markets：对于最新一代的市场参与者来说，数据的可获取性和不断扩展的数字解决方案使投资前所未有地民主化。我们将于 2 月 27 日在芝加哥与 @InvescoUS 共同举办 #TheFutureInvestor。
item.description: For the newest generation of market participants, accessibility to data and ever-expanding digital solutions are allowing the democratization of investing like never before. We’re in Chicago with @InvescoUS for #TheFutureInvestor February 27th. bloom.bg/48Y90Na

item.title: AFII 表示，希腊公用事业公司 PPC 比之前想象的更接近实现与可持续发展挂钩的债券目标
item.description: Greek utility PPC is closer to meeting a sustainability-linked bond target than previously thought, the AFII says trib.al/PolqeTS

item.title: 圭亚那总统伊尔法安-阿里（Irfaan Ali）呼吁 "立即 "开发天然气资源，使这个南美国家在石油出口迅速增长的基础上成为地区能源强国。
item.description: Guyana President Irfaan Ali called for the “immediate” development of its gas resources to make the South American country a regional energy powerhouse on top of its rapidly-growing oil exports trib.al/qdPkhAn

item.title: RT by @markets：今天，我们发布了一项调查，揭示了一位孟加拉国政客是如何在英国各地建立起一个价值 2 亿英镑的房地产帝国的，尽管他所宣称的财富只是这个数字的一小部分。
item.description: Today we published an investigation revealing how a Bangladeshi politician managed to build a £200 million property empire across the UK, despite his stated wealth coming to a fraction of that sum shorturl.at/gnAC3

item.title: 对 Currys 的收购兴趣使欧洲廉价零售股成为关注焦点，并促使分析师讨论哪些公司可能成为收购目标
item.description: Takeover interest in Currys is putting the spotlight on cheap European retail stocks and spurring chatter among analysts about which firms could be targets trib.al/uIc8JYN

item.title: 野村欧洲、中东和非洲流动利率部副主管 Gajowniczek 离职
item.description: Nomura’s Deputy Head of EMEA Flow Rates Gajowniczek Exits Firm trib.al/kwG5cJi

item.title: 欧盟新财政框架受到 Scope Ratings 的冷遇，该评级公司警告说，新财政框架的结果很可能会削减公共投资，却不会提高合规性。
item.description: The EU’s new fiscal framework gets a lukewarm welcome from Scope Ratings, which warns the outcome will probably cut public investment without increasing compliance trib.al/y7uL1JS

item.title:
RT by @markets：足球是世界上最受欢迎的运动，但其成功一直局限于欧洲，由 @Premierleague 主导。过去两年，随着卡塔尔世界杯的成功举办和 @SPL_EN 的振兴，足球的力量和影响力向东转移。在 3 月 7 日于吉达举行的 #PowerPlayers 峰会上，沙特职业联赛首席运营官 Carlo Nohra 将与我们一起探讨足球的未来。
立即注册：
item.description:
Football is the world's most popular sport, but success has been localized to Europe, with the @premierleague dominating. The past two years have seen power and influence shift eastwards, with the successful World Cup in Qatar and the revitalized @SPL_EN. We’re joined by a Carlo Nohra, COO, Saudi Pro League at the #PowerPlayers Summit in Jeddah on 7th March to discuss the future of football.

Register now: bloom.bg/3HI8s22

item.title: RT by @markets：新消息：英国央行前首席经济学家安迪-霍尔丹（Andy Haldane）告诉彭博社，如果英国央行不尽快转向降息，就有可能加深英国的经济衰退。
item.description: NEW: The Bank of England risks deepening the UK’s recession if it doesn't pivot to interest-rate cuts soon, its former chief economist Andy Haldane tells Bloomberg trib.al/I7HSO7J

item.title: 彭博绿色通讯社今天的天气雷达上有什么？加利福尼亚大风和洪水暴雨
item.description: What's on Bloomberg Green's weather radar today? High winds and flooding rains in California trib.al/sKUlInK

item.title: 巴西一家由杰夫-贝索斯支持的金融科技公司创始人拉斐尔-斯塔克（Rafael Stark）说，该公司的利润翻了一番，而从各轮融资中筹集到的现金却几乎没有动用。
item.description: A Jeff Bezos-backed fintech in Brazil has doubled its profits while leaving cash raised from its funding rounds nearly untouched, says founder Rafael Stark trib.al/fLhnlhU

item.title: 中国誓言集中技术开发，应对美国旨在限制其进步的贸易限制措施
item.description: China vows to centralize technology development as the country navigates US trade curbs designed to limit its advancement trib.al/bBXaoRW

item.title: 银行热衷于赢得 LBO 业务，以至于一些银行正在寻求超高风险的次级债务交易
item.description: Banks are so keen to win LBO business that some are pitching for ultra-risky subordinated debt deals trib.al/4QjjVH6

item.title: 中国南部省份海南省放宽首次购房者房贷政策，以促进下滑的房屋销售
item.description: China’s southern province of Hainan eases mortgage policies for first-time buyers to boost slumping home sales trib.al/mirOQ5V

item.title: Currys 竞标者彰显不受青睐的英国股票的价值
item.description: Currys Bidders Highlight Value in Unloved UK Stocks trib.al/WFLaSTf

item.title: 龙年伊始，猪肉供应过剩是整个中国经济出现供过于求问题的象征。
item.description: A glut of pork is emblematic of problems with oversupply that are happening across China's economy as the Year of the Dragon gets underway, writes @cangsizhi trib.al/NlXLAYW

item.title: 巴西 12 月经济增长超过预期，表明经济活动对高利率仍有一定的抵御能力
item.description: Brazil’s economy grew more than expected in December, indicating activity is still showing some resilience to high interest rates trib.al/vHFvVtD

item.title: 得益于赞比亚中央银行的政策措施，赞比亚货币迎来了近一年来最长的连涨期
item.description: Zambia’s currency is in its longest winning streak in nearly a year, thanks to policy steps by the country's central bank trib.al/SyfLtZk

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击造成设施损坏，俄罗斯炼油业雪上加霜
item.description: Russia’s oil refining suffers further as facilities struggle with damage caused by Ukrainian drone attacks trib.al/p9pvHgw

item.title: 中国电子商务巨头 JD .com 正在考虑对英国电子产品零售商 Currys 提出收购要约，在上周末 Elliott 的单独收购要约被拒绝后，竞购战的前景更加明朗。
item.description: Chinese e-commerce giant JD .com is considering an offer for British electronics retailer Currys, raising the prospect of a bidding war after a separate approach from Elliott was rejected over the weekend trib.al/FDQSGvf

item.title: 全球最大的航空公司贸易集团负责人恳求石油生产商生产更多低排放航空燃料，并警告说商业航空旅行的未来取决于该行业能否成功实现去碳化。
item.description: The head of global airlines’ biggest trade group implored oil producers to make more low-emissions aviation fuel, warning the future of commercial air travel depends on the industry’s successful decarbonization trib.al/KLOwVYK

item.title: 日本即将允许风险投资公司和其他投资基金直接持有数字资产
item.description: Japan inches closer to allowing venture capital firms and other investment funds to hold digital assets directly trib.al/NdlkwuH

item.title: 根据欧盟本周即将批准的一项提案，面向专业投资者的私人信贷基金将面临第一套更严格的规定
item.description: Private credit funds for professional investors are facing their first set of stricter rules under a EU proposal slated for approval this week trib.al/VQwjYX9

item.title: 汉莎航空地勤人员的罢工将导致 100,000 多名乘客出行受阻，这是对这家德国旗舰航空公司的沉重打击。
item.description: A strike by Lufthansa ground staff is set to disrupt more than 100,000 passengers in a blow to the flagship German airline that is facing its third bout of industrial action in almost three weeks trib.al/5P8o3uR

item.title: 摩根大通策略师认为，欧洲银行对股东的资本回报可能已经达到顶峰
item.description: European banks’ capital returns to shareholders may have already reached a peak, according to JPMorgan strategists trib.al/QhvfLIx

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔正在抗议意大利政府将该国最大的钢铁厂置于特别管理之下的举措，这可能违反了协议
item.description: ArcelorMittal is protesting an Italian government move to put the country’s biggest steel mill under special administration, marking a possible breach of agreement trib.al/mZYqbwc

item.title: 日本折扣零售商大创工业的创始人矢野浩竹因心脏衰竭去世。享年 80 岁
item.description: Hirotake Yano, the founder of Japanese discount retailer Daiso Industries, has died of a heart failure. He was 80 trib.al/PdTcCHt

item.title: 土耳其搁置与阿联酋的 85 亿美元伊斯兰债券交易，在全球债券市场寻求更便宜的选择
item.description: Turkey places an $8.5 billion sukuk deal with the UAE on hold, exploring cheaper options in the global bond markets trib.al/GVd1ILf
